body.name: aeac Smart Watches for Women (iOS & Android), with Alexa and Bluetooth Call (Answer/Make), 1.8'' Fitness Watch with Heart Rate/SpO2/Stress/Sleep Monitor, 100 Sports, IP68 Waterproof Smartwatches
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 24 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 🌈 【Bluetooth Call & Message Reminder】 This smart watch is equipped with speaker and bluetooth connectivity, you can directly make or receive calls with your family and friends via the smartwatch, also it supports multiple smart reminders, including incoming calls, text, SNS messages (Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, etc.), daily reminder, etc., extremely convenient for your life and you will never miss any important information.

💖 【Alexa Voice Assistant & Multi-Functions】The smart watch built-in Alexa Voice Assistant. Use your voice to control the music playback, ask questions, read the news and get information, check the weather, set alarms, control compatible smart home devices, and more. It makes things on your wrist simple and easy, and will always work as your effective daily assistant.

🩺 【Heart Rate/SpO2/Stress/Sleep Monitor】 The smartwatch has advanced sensors that help you detect 24-hour continuity real-time Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (Sp02), Stress and Sleep Monitoring(Deep/light sleep). All recorded data can be synced to your phone for analysis, providing valuable insights into your health and facilitating lifestyle adjustments.

🏃 【100+ Sports Modes & IP68 Waterproof】 The smart watch provides 100+ exercise modes, such as running, yoga, jumping jack, sit-ups, etc. During your exercise, it will record your data like heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance and active hours in real time. The fitness tracker is IP68 waterproof so you can wear it during outdoor activities, rainy days, washing hands.

💡 【Long Battery Life & Wide Compatibility】 Smart watches for men women feature a 1.8'' full touch HD color screen, with 100 dials to choose from, and have a built-in large capacity battery, which can be fully charged in 2 hours, can be used for up to 7 days and has a long standby time of about 30 days. The fitness watch works seamlessly with iOS or Android smartphones (Compatible with iOS 9.0 or above, Android 6.0 or above).

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Alexa Built-In, Stable Blutooth 5.3 Call-answer and Make Calls, IP68 Waterproof, Support multiple languages (such as Spanish), Message Notification, All-day activity tracker, Distance/steps/calories, 100+ Sports Mode, Blood oxygen/Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, Touch Screen, Long Battery Life See more

reviews.reviewText: I love my watch. Love the features with health info and number of steps. Long battery life, love the way it syncs with my phone. Great product for the price!

reviews.reviewText: it watch was well, compact and cute, measures all body measurements, easy to use, looks cool on wrist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The watch performs as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: I was able to sync the watch with my Samsung 23 without any problems. The watch has many features that very useful. Counts steps, checks spot, checks heartrate, tracks sleep quality, finds your phone, gives you the weather, and imagine this---tells time. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and it works great!
reviews.reviewText: So after buying one for my wife a year ago , tried several others. Returned them all as I was not satisfied with ‘‘em and in last case it would not pair with my phone. My wife’s watch continues to work flawlessly so I thought I would give it a try. Even though it cost much less than others it was simple to install, pair and works well. I was surprised that it was delivered a day after I ordered. No with on its second day it continues to impress me and delivered all that was in the description. Definitely a good buy and good value for the price.

reviews.reviewText: It is easier to keep up with my steps, don’t have to necessarily carry my iPhone with me. But I do out of habit. I’m gradually learning the functions. I really like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought a Smart Watch model IDW19. Very nice looking! When I I tried to pair it with my phone, I got a message that I needed to provide a Credit Card only to confirm the account and that I I wasnt going to get charged. I did and after a minute , I got a message from my Credit Card that a charge for $49.99 from Raisen Fall Gane Co hit my account. Immediately I cancelled the transacción, but a QR with the watch model and a Mac 8728 apear and I cannot continue since I have an android. There's no telephone number or customer service link that I can use to get ride of this QR and I cannot return it because the application contains my personal info. Any suggestions????

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful Watch! Huge Screen and works well.
reviews.reviewText: This smartwatch arrived in a small box and was well packaged. With the watch, you get a USB charging cable, an actual helpful user manual, and a warranty card.This is a nice-looking watch. It comes with a large 1.45” round display and the watch metal is gold. The band is pink. It looks very elegant. The band is a silicon type material and feels comfortable on the wrist. It will be easy to clean.Here is a complete list of functions of this watch:1- Information reminder, texts, email etc.2- Bluetooth calling/answering phone calls.3- Step counting, distance walked, calories.4- Heart Rate.5- Blood oxygen level.6- 14 Sport Modes.7- Breathing Exercise app.8- Sleep monitoring data.9- Alarm Clock.10- Weather Screen.11- Music Control.12- Remote Photo taking from phone.13- Timer.14- Stopwatch15- Settings.Although this smartwatch doesn’t have a Blood Pressure monitor, no big deal as so many watches that have it are not accurate anyway.This watch is very easy to setup and use. You can simply scan the QR code on the front of the user guide and it will bring you to the Google Play Store to download the OnWearPro App. Pairing took about 10 seconds.To use the watch:1- Swipe to the right to enter the phone call functions.2- Swipe to the left to enter daily activities and other screens.3- Swipe down to access quick menus.4- Swipe up to access messages or notifications.The watch works well; it feels comfortable on the arm. Response from touch is good. The calling function worked as it should. The audio was clear and loud enough. It worked flawlessly and I wasn’t that close to my phone. The heart rate monitor is a good guide and is close to what it should be. I have a blood pressure monitor machine and its close. Perhaps reading from the wrist will read different from the arm. The battery is good; it lasts for about 3-4 days of moderate to heavy use.Overall, I’m very pleased with this watch. It checks all the boxes for a smartwatch to help you keep track of some health data and at the same time gives you a decent experience with convenience to be able to access your notifications and make and receive calls. For the money, it is a good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smart Watch - MEN - Checks all the boxes for the Money!
reviews.reviewText: The Smart watch arrived in a small white box; just over 6" (15.5cm). Comes with the battery charging cable which is about 2 ft long (60cm). Not bad; would be nice if it was longer. I charged it up immediately upon opening the box as recommended by the manufacturer and stated in the included instruction manual. The box also contains a warranty card with a QR code to help you navigate to register the product. The watch looks elegant and feels comfortable on the wrist. I have a medium to large wrist and the watch face looks good; not too big/not small at all. The band is well adjustable and has 1 strap loop to hold the band together. I found the instructions in the manual easy to use; simply scan the QR code to begin. It brought me to the Play Store where I downloaded the app. (OnWearPro) I like the look and features on the default watch face. It shows the digital and analog time, month and day, battery level, heart rate, steps, and calories. As shown in the pictures, you simply swipe from right to left to navigate through the watch features. I did setup notifications for texts and it works well. I disabled Email notifications as it gets annoying after a while with too many emails. The weather report screen is accurate and picked up right away. The app is OK; I found that sometimes the watch won't show weather or messages until I open the app again on the phone. I guess this is setup this way so both the app and phone are syncing. There are a lot of watch faces to choose from but honestly; I haven't seen one I like better than the default watch face. You can choose however a custom watch face and import pictures of your own. This is a cool feature. I've been using the watch now for about 4 days; still have 56% battery life. This is satisfactory and its better than what I expected; I have been playing with it quite a bit learning how to use. I also tried making a phone call with it; it worked well; called without a glitch and sound was audibly comfortable. Overall; I'm pleasantly pleased with this watch; it appears to be well made and crafted. I'm not demanding for any sport/workout features so it has everything I want in a smartwatch and feel its a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good sized clockface, not to big or too small. I have smallish wrists so didnt want anything huge. All features work well and its easy to use which is perfect for me.Its well priced and Im really glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bello, leggero, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo 🎉
reviews.reviewText: Un bellissimo orologio molto comodo per la vita di tutti i giorni e di facile utilizzo. Assolutamente consigliato 🎉Indossandolo ci si dimentica di averlo, il cinturino è realizzato in materiale di alta qualità, le funzioni di Alexa e la possibilità di rispondere direttamente dall'orologio, lo rendono completo.Unica nota per essere davvero perfetto, inserirei la possibilità di rispondere con risposte brevi ai messaggi di WhatsApp 💪 magari con un nuovo aggiornamento sarà possibile farlo 🤞
